definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: (Ges:§ 53 R. 4 Kö:i. 251) Impf. 2 mpl. [[תַּהְכְּרוּ]] in phrase [[לאׁ־תֵבשׁוּ]] [[תַהְכְּרוּ־לִי]] Job 19:3, sense very dubious ; Schult Thes De al. (as Hiph.) ye came me ([[לְ]] = acc.) to wonder (cf. Ar. hakara); others (as Qal) ye deal hardy with, wrong me (so context seems rather to require, v. Ges in Add:84 RobGes Ew Di Da RV; cf. Ar. h.akara wrong, detract from; Codd. rd. [[תחכרו]], which is preferable, if this mng. be adopted; LXX e(pi/keisqe/ moi, Vulgate opprimentes); conjectures are [[תְּחָֽרְפוּ]] O1:Hiob; [[תַּחַבְרוּ אֵלָָי]] Me; Siegf [[תִּתְחַבְּרוּ]].
